title: Forbes Social Impact List
description: Lilan Dayananda, our cofounder and CEO, has secured a prestigious position on Forbes Magazine’s “30 Under 30 Asia” list in the social impact category.

title: Elzian Agro at ChangeNOW 2025: Pioneering Sustainable Agriculture Solutions on the Global Stage
description: Lilan Dayananda, the Managing Director and CEO of Elzian Agro, is set to represent his innovative agritech startup at ChangeNOW 2025, the world expo of solutions for the planet, held at the iconic Grand Palais in Paris, France, from April 24 to 26, 2025. This event marks a significant milestone as it coincides with the 10th anniversary of the Paris Agreement, emphasizing the urgent need for decisive climate action and sustainable development.

title: Elzian Agro Explores Future in Space Agriculture at COPUOS Session
description: Lilan Dayananda, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Elzian Agro, outlined the company’s ambitious vision to enter the Space Agriculture Sector during the 67th Session of the Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer Space (COPUOS) in Vienna, Austria. The session, held in 2024, continues to address space-related legal issues, promote sustainable space exploration, and enhance global collaboration in space science and technology. COPUOS plays a crucial role in developing international space law and fostering dialogue among nations on space governance.

title: Elzian Agro to Expand Operations to EU Through Malta
description: Lilan Dayananda, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Elzian Agro, has unveiled the company’s ambitious plan to expand its operations into the European Union via Malta. In a productive meeting with Startup in EU partners and Koperattivi Malta, discussions centered on the economic potential of cooperatives in facilitating a sustainable transition to regenerative and precision agriculture for enhanced food security.

title: Elzian Agro is among the Top Visionary Green Startups
description: We’re thrilled to introduce the 25 innovative businesses selected for the YECO Accelerator! From an inspiring group of 125 Bootcamp participants, these startups have stood out for their commitment to green entrepreneurship and sustainable innovation. These forward-thinking entrepreneurs are not just reshaping industries they’re leading the charge toward a more sustainable future.

title: Elzian Agro’s CEO Lilan Dayananda Joins for Climate Reality Leadership Training in Rome
description: Lilan Dayananda, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Elzian Agro, recently participated in the Climate Reality Leadership Training held at the Rome Convention Center La Nuvola in Italy. The event, which included former U.S. Vice President Al Gore, brought together climate leaders for three days of intensive learning, sharing, and strategizing.

title: Elzian Agro Explores Agricultural Innovation at National Museum of Agriculture in Ostrava
description: ELZIAN AGRO’s software solutions have streamlined agricultural processes and made significant contributions to fostering sustainable practices within communities. By continually challenging the limits of innovation, the company has set new benchmarks in the industry, paving the way for a future where technology and agriculture are seamlessly integrated. During the visit, Lilan elaborated on the innovations of Elzian Agro and how it supports farmers to increase crop yield; and be cost and energy efficient.

title: CEO of Elzian Agro has been selected to participate in the prestigious Moonshot Young Leaders Camp
description: During the program, Lilan also met the President Petr Pavel of the Czech Republic, the royal family of the House of Lobkowicz at Prague Castle, Senator Ondřej Šimetka and Martin Kupka, Minister of Transport of Czechia. The Moonshot Young Leaders Camp, held in the historic cities of Prague and Ostrava, offered participants direct mentorship from global leaders and hands-on leadership workshops.

title: Managing Director and CEO of Elzian Agro Named Social Entrepreneur of the Year at New Generation Asia Awards
description: Lilan Dayananda, the dynamic Managing Director and CEO of Elzian Agro, was honored as the Social Entrepreneur of the Year at the Fifth New Generation Asia Awards held at the Shangri-La Hotel in Colombo. This event celebrated over 40 young leaders for their exceptional achievements across various sectors, including leadership, entrepreneurship, technology, media, and more.

title: Elzian Agro Named Finalist in Falling Walls Science Startups Category
description: Elzian Agro has been recognized as a finalist in the Science Startups category by the prestigious Falling Walls Foundation. The Falling Walls Science Summit, an esteemed international forum for scientific breakthroughs, celebrates the fall of the Berlin Wall and fosters dialogue between science and society.

title: Elzian Agro Explores Future in Space Agriculture at COPUOS Session
description: The United Nations Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer Space (COPUOS) is dedicated to promoting international cooperation in the peaceful use of outer space and addressing legal issues related to space exploration. The UN's interest in space began in 1957 with the launch of the first Sputnik, highlighting the need for space to be used for peaceful purposes and its benefits to be shared globally. Established in 1958, the United Nations Office for Outer Space Affairs (UNOOSA) serves as the secretariat for COPUOS and its subcommittees.

title: ELZIAN AGRO Triumphs at SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2024
description: ELZIAN AGRO, a leading force in the agricultural technology sector, has achieved remarkable success at the prestigious SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2024. The company's unwavering dedication to innovation and sustainability has earned them high praise and multiple accolades, cementing their status as industry leaders. In a landmark achievement, ELZIAN AGRO was named the National Winner in the fiercely contested Best Innovative Project in Agritech category.

title: CEO of Elzian Agro honored as Social Entrepreneur of the Year at New Generation Asia Awards
description: Lilan Dayananda, the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Elzian Agro, was celebrated as the Social Entrepreneur of the Year at the prestigious Fifth New Generation Asia Awards held at the Shangri-La Hotel in Colombo. This year's awards recognized over 40 outstanding young individuals for their contributions across various fields, including leadership, entrepreneurship, politics, technology, media, arts, social media, innovation, sports, agriculture, tourism, and education.

title: Elzian Agro at the DigiEcon Global Investment Summit 2024
description: Elzian Agro is delighted to announce its selection for the prestigious DigiEcon Global Investment Summit 2024. This exceptional opportunity will allow Elzian Agro to showcase its groundbreaking solutions, and engage with global leaders, investors, and visionaries in the technology sector.

title: Elzian Agro is among the Science Startup Finalist at the Faling Walls Science Summit
description: The Falling Walls Science Summit features a Science Startup category, which is part of the global competition Falling Walls Venture. This platform showcases pioneering science-based start-ups that have successfully turned scientific innovations into business solutions. The most innovative start-ups are selected by an Advisory Board and invited to pitch their breakthrough innovations on the Falling Walls Venture stage in Berlin. The selected start-ups gain access to exclusive networking events and the Falling Walls Community.

title: Elzian Agro Named Among Top 10 Sri Lankan Startups by TechRound
description: TechRound, a premier online magazine based in the UK, is renowned for its coverage of the latest startup and tech news, offering insights into business trends and helping brands achieve new heights. Elzian Agro, a leading precision agriculture company in  Sri Lanka, has been recognized by TechRound as one of the top 10  Sri Lankan startups to watch.

title: ELZIAN AGRO REACHES FINALS IN WORLD BANK YOUTH INNOVATION CHALLENGE
description: Elzian Agro brings a rich mix of skills and expertise, enabling them to offer robust support to farmers through an advanced monitoring and decision-support system with integrated automation. Their IoT monitoring system provides precise environmental weather and soil data, mainly for industrial and agricultural applications. Additionally, their automation system, which includes both hardware and software, efficiently manages irrigation and other agricultural processes.

title: Elzian Agro has been recognized by TechRound as one of the top 10 Sri Lankan startups
description: Elzian Agro, a leading precision agriculture company in Sri Lanka, has been recognized by TechRound as one of the top 10 Sri Lankan startups to watch.This recognition by TechRound is the latest in a series of accolades for Elzian Agro. The company was named among the top ten youth-driven social enterprises at the Global-South Development Expo 2022, an honor bestowed by the United Nations.

title: ELZIAN AGRO TACKLES CLIMATE CHANGE WITH WATER SOLUTIONS AS FINALIST IN WORLD BANK YOUTH INNOVATION CHALLENGE
description: Elzian Agro, a Sri Lankan precision agriculture firm, has been named a finalist in the World Bank Youth Innovation Challenge, specifically focusing on water solutions for a new climate reality. The challenge, orchestrated by the World Bank’s Solutions for Youth Employment (S4YE).

title: Elzian Agro Named Among Top 10 Regenerative Agriculture Startups at Food Tech Congress
description: The Food Tech Congress, aligned with the Farm to Fork Strategy of the European Green Deal, is a hub where innovation flourishes, bold ideas ignite, and significant business transactions occur. The congress will bring together the most prominent food tech entrepreneurs, innovators, investors, and government leaders from around the world to address the industry’s most pressing challenges.

title: ELZIAN AGRO INNOVATES WATER SOLUTIONS TO ADDRESS CLIMATE CHANGE
description: Elzian Agro has been selected to participate in the World Bank Youth Innovation Challenge, recognized for its cutting-edge water solutions tailored to address new climate challenges. The challenge, organized by the World Bank’s Solutions for Youth Employment (S4YE), and young people to create programs that increase productive employment for youth.

title: ELZIAN AGRO INNOVATES WATER SOLUTIONS TO ADDRESS CLIMATE CHANGE AS FINALIST IN WORLD BANK YOUTH INNOVATION CHALLENGE
description: Elzian Agro, a pioneering precision agriculture company from Sri Lanka, has been honored as a finalist in the World Bank Youth Innovation Challenge, which highlights innovative water solutions for the new climate reality.

title: Elzian Agro Named Finalist in World Bank Youth Innovation Challenge
description: The challenge is organized by the World Bank Solutions for Youth Employment (S4YE). S4YE is a global program that brings together donors, governments, foundations, private sector companies, NGOs, and youth to support catalytic programs that increase the number of young people engaged in productive work.

title: 40 Most Innovative Western Based Farming Companies & Startups
description: This article showcases our top picks for the best Western based Farming companies. These startups and companies are taking a variety of approaches to innovating the Farming industry, but are all exceptional companies well worth a follow under innovation, growth, management and social impact.

title: Elzian Agro Pitches for the WFF Startup Innovation Awards
description: The WFF Startup Innovation Awards, powered by Extreme Tech Challenge (XTC) are a global startup competition established to support and showcase young innovators and entrepreneurs who are harnessing the power of technology to drive the sustainable transformation of agrifood systems in support of ending global hunger and achieving the Sustainable Development Goals.

title: Elzian Agro becomes one of top finalists in Expo City Dubai ExpoLive Innovation Program
description: Elzian Agro’s achievement was celebrated at the Terra Pavilion in Expo City Dubai, where they engaged with talented individuals from 37 nations who shared their passion for positive impact. Renowned for their groundbreaking technologies and sustainable farming methods, Elzian Agro stands as a frontrunner in the industry.

title: ELZIAN AGRO, A Rising Star in Dubai’s Expo Live Innovation Program
description: In a world grappling with the challenges of food security and environmental sustainability, ELZIAN AGRO’s outstanding achievement serves as a beacon of hope and inspiration. Their unwavering pursuit of excellence, fueled by a strong commitment to innovation and sustainability, positions them as catalysts for change and progress.

By pushing boundaries and introducing cutting-edge technologies, ELZIAN AGRO has redefined the possibilities within farming.

description: Sri Lanka's tech industry was abuzz with excitement and anticipation as the prestigious SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2023 unfolded, celebrating remarkable achievements and groundbreaking innovations.

description: ELZIAN AGRO, a trailblazer in the field of agricultural technology, emerged as a shining star at the prestigious SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2023. The event, which celebrated groundbreaking innovation and exceptional achievements in the tech industry, bore witness to ELZIAN AGRO's remarkable success and garnered them well-deserved accolades across various categories.

description: We are thrilled to announce the National Winners of the prestigious SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards!These brilliant minds have redefined innovation and set new benchmarks in the tech industry. Join us in celebrating their remarkable achievements!

The company's relentless pursuit of innovation and commitment to sustainability has garnered them resounding praise and numerous accolades across multiple categories, solidifying their position as leaders in the industry.

title: ELZIAN AGRO AT THE GLOBAL SOUTH-SOUTH DEVELOPMENT EXPO
description: ELZIAN AGRO made the awareness of our ongoing bio-socio-economic experiments that can quantify human contributions of Oxygen and clean water cycling to the atmosphere (Primary ecosystem services) with one of our affiliate organizations and the importance of climate-smart data-driven precision agriculture.

title: University of Kelaniya played a leading role in the success of Elzian Agro
description: ELZIAN AGRO Pest Prediction System won the Merit Award of SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2022 under Best Innovative Product. COO of ELZIAN AGRO Pankajan Satkunam received the award on behalf of the team on the 1st of July, 2022 at Shangri-La Colombo.

description: ELZIAN AGRO Pest Prediction System won the Merit Award of SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2022 under Best Innovative Product. COO of ELZIAN AGRO Pankajan Satkunam received the award on behalf of the team on the 1st of July, 2022 at Shangri-La Colombo.

title: Putting an end to world hunger through smart agronomy solutions
description: Elzian Agro provides smart agronomy solutions through advanced automation systems for farmers who face extreme weather changes, pests, and diseases and have limited resources such as water, fertiliser, and labour.

title: Elzian Agro - Generation Unlimited Youth Challenge
description: At GenU, ELZIAN AGRO on a mission to provide climate-smart, data-driven precision agriculture solutions for support farmers to increase crop yield.
